item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, December 12, 2024 at 8:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. A ChatGPT clone, in 3000 bytes of C, backed by GPT-2 (2023) (130 points | 27 comments)
2. FCC opens entire 6 GHz band to low power device operations (563 points | 196 comments)
3. Mysterious New Jersey drone sightings prompt call for 'state of emergency' (293 points | 445 comments)
4. Gemini 2.0: our new AI model for the agentic era (736 points | 373 comments)
5. Ham Radio All-in-One-Cable (109 points | 18 comments)
6. The Cold Email Handbook (195 points | 83 comments)
7. QEMU with VirtIO GPU Vulkan Support (177 points | 36 comments)
8. Review of Mullvad VPN (320 points | 101 comments)
9. PeerTube mobile app: discover videos while caring for your attention (366 points | 129 comments)
10. OnlyFans models are using AI impersonators to keep up with their DMs (223 points | 285 comments)
11. Tricking c64 basic into clearing a hi-res screen quickly (31 points | 5 comments)
12. Certain names make ChatGPT grind to a halt, and we know why (57 points | 22 comments)
13. Pgroll – Zero-downtime, reversible, schema changes for PostgreSQL (new website) (205 points | 38 comments)
14. Geometry clipmaps: simple terrain rendering with level of detail (2017) (6 points | discuss)
15. Instant macOS install on Proxmox including AMD patches (127 points | 40 comments)
16. Launch HN: Azalea Robotics (YC S24) – Baggage-handling robots for airports (102 points | 61 comments)
17. Deciphering C++ compiler errors: Nonsensical errors from a function declaration (17 points | 10 comments)
18. The GPU is not always faster (144 points | 75 comments)
19. 2400 phone providers may be shut down by the FCC for failing to stop robocalls (318 points | 198 comments)
20. Evolving my ergonomic setup (or, my laptop with extra steps) (135 points | 71 comments)
21. RISC-V HiFive Premier P550 Development Boards with Ubuntu Now Available (142 points | 72 comments)
22. Dear OAuth Providers (220 points | 51 comments)
23. The Myth of Bananaland (123 points | 92 comments)
24. A letter to open-source maintainers (128 points | 38 comments)
25. Dioxus 0.6 – Crossplatform apps with Rust (217 points | 90 comments)
26. Canada euthanasia now accounts for nearly one in 20 deaths (57 points | 38 comments)
27. Django and Postgres for the Busy Rails Developer (158 points | 85 comments)
28. Storing Times for Human Events (109 points | 45 comments)
29. Majora's Mask decompilation project reaches 100% completion (62 points | 6 comments)
30. Unix Review Magazine Interviews Larry Tesler (41 points | 6 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, December 12, 2024 at 8:20 AM UTC
